接口 com.aliyun.oss.OSS
的使用

  • 使用OSS的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.aliyun.oss  

    • com.aliyun.oss中OSS的使用

      实现OSS的com.aliyun.oss中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  OSSClient
      The entry point class of OSS that implements the OSS interface.
      class  OSSEncryptionClient
      OSSEncryptionClient is used to do client-side encryption.
      返回OSS的com.aliyun.oss中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      OSS OSSClientBuilder.OSSClientBuilderImpl.build() 
      OSS OSSClientBuilder.build(String endpoint, CredentialsProvider credsProvider) 
      OSS OSSBuilder.build(String endpoint, CredentialsProvider credsProvider)
      Uses the specified CredentialsProvider and OSS Endpoint to create a new OSSClient instance.
      OSS OSSClientBuilder.build(String endpoint, CredentialsProvider credsProvider, ClientBuilderConfiguration config) 
      OSS OSSBuilder.build(String endpoint, CredentialsProvider credsProvider, ClientBuilderConfiguration config)
      Uses the specified CredentialsProvider, client configuration and OSS endpoint to create a new OSSClient instance.
      OSS OSSClientBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey) 
      OSS OSSBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey)
      Uses the specified OSS Endpoint and Access Id/Access Key to create a new OSSClient instance.
      OSS OSSClientBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey, ClientBuilderConfiguration config) 
      OSS OSSBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey, ClientBuilderConfiguration config)
      Uses a specified OSS Endpoint, Access Id, Access Key, Client side configuration to create a OSSClient instance.
      OSS OSSClientBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey, String securityToken) 
      OSS OSSBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey, String securityToken)
      Uses the specified OSS Endpoint, a security token from AliCloud STS and Access Id/Access Key to create a new OSSClient instance.
      OSS OSSClientBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey, String securityToken, ClientBuilderConfiguration config) 
      OSS OSSBuilder.build(String endpoint, String accessKeyId, String secretAccessKey, String securityToken, ClientBuilderConfiguration config)
      Uses specified OSS Endpoint, the temporary (Access Id/Access Key/Security Token) from STS and the client configuration to create a new OSSClient instance.
